title: Drawing, "Portrait of a Man, Giuseppe Valadier", 1825–27
medium: Graphite on off-white laid paper mounted on tan wove paper. Ruled lines in ink on mount.
signed: In graphite lower left on mount: Wicar
inscribed:
Recto: Upper left in graphite: "6"
Verso: At bottom of sheet in graphite: Louis XVIII par Wicar
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: A bust portrait of a man, in three-quarters view facing left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Portrait of a Man, Giuseppe Valadier", 1825–27.
1825–27. Graphite on off-white laid paper mounted on tan wove paper. Ruled lines in ink on mount.. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7044.
